name: Cleanup Simulator
description:
Attention: There is a bug in the SaveGame of this version. If you return to the menu, you have to restart from level 1.

CLEANUP SIMULATOR is a simple 3D Puzzle Game where you have to eliminate (throw out) all doubled items / furniture in the room.  

Theme: Less is more!

The game was created in 1 week by myself alone.  I did not have that much time, so I created a relatively small game this time :D

The music and sfx were imported from an asset pack.

Controls:

WASD:  Movement

SPACE: Jump

SHIFT: Sprint

Mouse: Camera

E: Pickup / Drop

R: Reset rotation
